59 /* save old LIXA_TRACE_MODULE and set a new value */

62 # undef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE
63 #else
64 # undef LIXA_TRACE_MODULE_SAVE
65 #endif /* LIXA_TRACE_MODULE */
